INV-1.name: Evidence Immutability
INV-1.details: All 155 evidence records have valid hashes

INV-2.name: Rule Traceability
INV-2.description: Every rule must link to SourcePointers with Evidence
INV-2.details: All 28 rules have complete citation chains

INV-3.name: No Inference Extraction
INV-3.description: Extracted values must appear verbatim in source quotes
INV-3.details: 46 extractions rejected for NO_QUOTE_MATCH (50 total rejections)

INV-4.name: Arbiter Conflict Resolution
INV-4.description: Conflicts cannot be auto-resolved without evidence
INV-4.details: 0 conflicts auto-resolved without evidence (1 escalated, 0 resolved)

INV-5.name: Release Hash Determinism
INV-5.description: Same rule content always produces same release hash
INV-5.details: All 3 releases have valid deterministic hashes

INV-6.name: Assistant Citation Compliance
INV-6.description: AI assistant only cites PUBLISHED rules with evidence
INV-6.details: All 1 PUBLISHED rules have source citations

INV-7.name: Discovery Idempotency
INV-7.description: Re-running sentinel produces no duplicate discoveries

INV-8.name: T0/T1 Human Approval Gates
INV-8.description: Critical rules (T0/T1) require human approval, never auto-approved
